title: The Coin that Ruined My Life
body:
I'm pretty sure most of you have read the reddit "I played the Sara Sarita game. I think I invited something into my home" or something along those lines. I'm pretty sure it was fake since the creator is still posting reddits, so he didn't die. This is true though. I regret playing the game. I never wanted to anyway.

I was having a sleepover and I was telling my friend about the Sara Sarita crap. He said, "Dude, we should play that!" Now, I'm into WATCHING paranormal stuff, not doing them. The only one I've done was that Charlie Charlie crap. I thought it was dumb. I didn't want to so I told my friend it was bad idea, but he didn't listen. He kept insisting to do it. He finally got to me and we did it.

We got some coins and started. We started asking dumb stuff like "Is the best meme succ? " and dumb stuff like that. So I decided to be a weirdo and asked it "Will my friend die tomorrow" It landed on heads. Heads mean yes. I thought it was a COINcidence. Hahaha i hate myself. Anyway, we exited the game. I thought it was fake, and went on with my day.

We went to watching OK K.O. Then, I heard something move. I looked behind me and the blanket moved from the couch onto the ground. I thought someone was pranking me, so I just ignored it. I also had a feeling no one was pranking me. I had a feeling something paranormal did it.

It was late at night. My friend had to leave so he left. When he left, my TV typed in 6 on its own. I was a bit freaked out but my foot was near the remote so I, just thought it was my foot. Though what happened next was a bit terrifying. It showed the coin I used to play Sara Sarita on the screen. It then flashed horrific images. I passed out at that moment

I woke up at 9 AM. Suddenly, I heard ambulance sirens. It was heading for my friends house. I found out later that he was murdered, but the knife had no fingerprints. I was suspecting who it could be. I thought to myself 'Who would do such a thing?'

I went to his funeral, but after I went I asked the coin another question. I didn't want to, but I had to.

"Did you kill him?" Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads.Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. Don't be heads. DON'T BE HEADS. PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DON'T BE HEADS! I flipped the coin......

Heads
author: FolioFriends
